data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Tulcea unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tulcea, Romania
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Tulcea with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 15 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Tulcea, Romania that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 15 neighbors who are far from you in Tulcea. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Tatar, Crimean people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Tulcea, Romania to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 179,940 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Tulcea, Romania.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary:
the state of Tulcea, Romania has a population of 192,100.

We estimate Tulcea has 12,159 people who might know Jesus, 167,753 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 12,187 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 15 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Tulcea prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.
